name: CAG Agent Workflow - 8 Phase Sequence
description: Complete workflow for an agent operating within the Context-Augmented Generation system. Captures complete context for every workload.

movements.name: Phase 1: Context Loading
movements.description: Load the governance core and establish baseline context

movements.name: Phase 2: Context Verification

movements.name: Phase 4: Context Tree Mapping
movements.description: Map complete governance context for all affected files

movements.name: Phase 5: Action Planning
movements.description: Plan the work within the established context

movements.name: Phase 6: Action Execution
movements.description: Execute planned actions while maintaining context

movements.name: Phase 7: Telemetry Emission
